SEARCH
Package src.interfaces

Interface IMedicalRecordBasicOperations

All Known Subinterfaces:
IMedicalRecordRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
MedicalRecordRepository
public interface IMedicalRecordBasicOperations
Interface defining basic CRUD operations for medical records

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMedicalRecord(String medicalRecordID, MedicalRecord medicalRecord)
    Adds a new medical record to the system
    boolean
    deleteMedicalRecord(String medicalRecordID)
    Deletes a medical record from the system
    MedicalRecord
    getMedicalRecordByID(String medicalRecordID)
    Retrieves a specific medical record by its ID
    HashMap<String,MedicalRecord>
    readMedicalRecord(String patientID)
    Retrieves all medical records associated with a patient

  • Method Details

    • addMedicalRecord

      void addMedicalRecord(String medicalRecordID, MedicalRecord medicalRecord)
      Adds a new medical record to the system
      Parameters:
      medicalRecordID - Unique identifier for the medical record
      medicalRecord - The medical record object to be added

    • readMedicalRecord

      HashMap<String,MedicalRecord> readMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Retrieves all medical records associated with a patient
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient
      Returns:
      HashMap containing medical record IDs mapped to their corresponding medical records

    • getMedicalRecordByID

      MedicalRecord getMedicalRecordByID(String medicalRecordID)
      Retrieves a specific medical record by its ID
      Parameters:
      medicalRecordID - The unique identifier of the medical record
      Returns:
      The requested medical record, or null if not found

    • deleteMedicalRecord

      boolean deleteMedicalRecord(String medicalRecordID)
      Deletes a medical record from the system
      Parameters:
      medicalRecordID - The unique identifier of the medical record to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise
